channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 5 takeaways from the 2025 Emmy nominations

item.title: Huge Mars meteorite expected to go for millions at auction
item.description: A 54-pound meteorite from Mars is expected to fetch up to $4 million when it goes up for auction on Wednesday at Sotheby's.

item.title: Stocks fall after report shows inflation increased in June

item.title: French PM looks to scrap two public holidays in bold bid to cut national debt
item.description: MPs will vote on François Bayrou's budget plan in the autumn, in a moment of high risk for the government.

item.title: Judge says Trump administration can’t use travel ban to keep 80 refugees out of the US

item.description: Neighborhood social network app Nextdoor is getting a redesign with some new features. Nextdoor CEO Nirav Tolia joins CBS News to discuss.

item.title: Senate to move on Trump request to cut foreign aid, public media funding
item.description: Some senators have concerns as Congress faces a Friday deadline to act on the rescissions request.

item.title: Adolescence star Owen Cooper becomes Emmys' youngest ever nominee
item.description: If he wins, Cooper will be the youngest male winner of an acting Emmy. See who are the others up for the TV industry's most prestigious awards.

item.title: Trump says Ukraine should not target Moscow
item.description: Trump asked Ukraine's Zelensky earlier this month if he could strike Moscow and other Russian targets, the Financial Times reported.

item.title: Trump claims tariff deal with Indonesia
item.description: Trump says the US will lower its tariffs threatened on goods from Indonesia to 19% from a planned 32%.
